title: Netflix subscribers can now play Riot Gamesâ€™ Hextech Mayhem and Dungeon Dwarves for free
content:
After rolling out its gaming service worldwide late last year, Netflix is now focusing on expanding its game catalog. Today, the company has added two new titles from Riot Games — Dungeon Dwarves and Hextech Mayhem — to its lineup. If you’re a League of Legends fan, you should definitely check them out and kill

The post Netflix subscribers can now play Riot Games’ Hextech Mayhem and Dungeon Dwarves for free appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Netflix has added two new games from Riot Games to its growing lineup of exclusive mobile games -- Hextech Mayhem and Dungeon Dwarves.
